src_original: nābhāpramāṇam eṣām śakyaṃ pramātum ity apramāṇābhāḥ.  kṛtsnasthānāntarodbhāsanād ābhāsvarāḥ.
tad eṣām anyabhūmim apekṣya parīttam iti parīttaśubhāḥ.  apramāṇaṃ śubham eṣām apramāṇaśubhāḥ.  śubhaṃ kṛtsnam eṣām iti śubhakṛtsnāḥ.
[Tib.244a] na tadutkṛṣṭataram anyatrāsti sukham ity abhiprāyaḥ.
abhravad eṣāṃ bbūmisaṃbaṃdho nāstīty anabhrakāḥ.  saha sattvena tadvimānodayavyayād iti vacanān naiṣām upari bhūmyantaram astīti anabhrakāḥ.
